name: Please name me pong
description:
Please name me!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

(DOUBLE CLICK GREEN FLAG!)

instruction:

-Use the mouse to move

-Right and left arrow to switch your paddle

-Stop the ball from touching the spikes

-The more score you have faster the ball will be

-The pink circle is your health

-you lost score when the ball touch other thing than your paddle

------------------------------------------------------------------------
